Articles.Content:
Griff Space Labs

Ok so cause ive given up trying to upload to Spaceport i was advised to try here.

Griff Space Labs are relived to anoce the first in a series of SLS designs starting with

Griff SLS Block IA Crew.

Based on currunt SLS designs. My first ever add on for any game.

Many mods were used to make this and i thank the clever kerbals that can make mods.

Mods i used are ( if missed any please let me know

Orda

MechJab 2

Jool V

Tiberdyne Space Shuttle

KSPX Parts Expansion

Munar Excursion Module

Fairing Factory

Crew Manifest

ISA

GPS

This is a very stable and very powerfull Ship Is dockable to.

Download file from here. http://www./?lky70uk78yagpxc
any feed back or comments on this wud be usefull chaps

ok so ive scraped this as i cant seem to find the mods that i used, so i can update to the currunt version. i be be endevering to redo it for the currunt version of the game but it my take awhile.(seeing as fairing factory mod has completly disapeared etc)
